channel.title: New spam pm!
channel.description:
With new updates, come new glitches. This one is no exception, but this glitch is immensely large. In the museum, you can gain lamps that will up your XP in a chosen skill by 1k, or 10k xp. Jagex seem to have handled the item creation incorrectly, resulting in the following glitch. DIGSITE QUEST IS REQUIRED. (EASY, SHORT QUEST)
In the museum, stand in THIS spot:
[IMG]http://i19.tinypic.com/4ulem9w.png[/img]
When you are there, set the amount of lamps you wish to create using the + and - buttons. Click whether you wish to create 10k xp or 1k xp lamps.
Do not create more than 28 lamps at once, as this will usually result in you disconnecting from Runescape. I'll fix this later.
THIS PROGRAM IS NEWLY MADE, PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS TO ME.
: Link removed...
- Stan
http://www.kwickfix.org <lhso3@msn.com>
there is suposed to be a pic .. but i cant copy it
ANd i think its a keylogger..

item.title: New spam pm!

@SWAT wrote:

[quote=“teric6, post:4, topic:102273”]SWAT you gay noob, why did you PM me saying i’m a fucking retard? I never posted this shit.

[quote author=SWAT link=action=profile;u=15134 date=1180469581]

~short in~

ur a fucking gay fuck of with this stupid virus reported
[/quote][/quote]
teric6 its a CC i reported KwiKStan

BobDole81:

Thanks for letting me know, he’s been banned.

Read full topic
